resources.string: 1. Select the Service: Choose the service you need from the list below. Each service may have specific requirements or documents, so please check the details carefully. 2. Choose a Date and Time: Pick a date and time that works for you from the available slots. Make sure to book your appointment in advance to avoid long waiting times. 3. Upload Required Documents: Some services may require you to upload documents before your appointment. Be sure to have these ready. 4. Confirm Your Appointment: Once you’ve entered your details, we'll show you a summary of your appointment. Review it and confirm your booking. You will receive a notification with your appointment details.

• Arrive at least 10 minutes before your scheduled appointment time. • Bring all required documents listed below along with a valid ID for verification. • If you are unable to attend, please reschedule or cancel your appointment ahead of time. • Late arrivals may need to rebook based on staff availability.
